metadata.title: CVE-2022-38090 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Improper isolation of shared resources in some Intel(R) Processors when using Intel(R) Software Guard Extensions may allow a privileged user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20230214.0ubuntu0.22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20230214.0ubuntu0.22.10.1').
